text: @bennyjohnson @AnnCoulter President responded to COVID-19 death toll reaching  100k with compassionate caring!  I don’t judge laughing about a cocky man staring at death and losing!  It was inappropriate for him to laugh, not morally reprehensible.  Gov of NY and mayor if NYC get a free pass on many wrong
